Articles.Content:
a rough copy of the type 26 multirole fighter from Halo wars, the best I could come up with using ksp parts and kerbpaint, its painted in a heretic gold purple scheme, and as is to be expected It does not and probably never will fly though I challenge you to try and make it fly, in the games lore they use gravpods in the wingtip engines to assist in flight and can travel up to speeds of about 300km/h, with those stubby wings I can understand why

here's a screenshot: http://imgur.com/gallery/GAwQoGK/new

here's the .craft file on my dropbox if you want to play around with it and maybe see if you can get it to fly (post a screenshot here if you manage it): https://www.dropbox.com/s/q4cqlcl0o6hivvj/halo%20wars%20type%2026%20multirole%20fighter.craft?dl=0

that's all folks!!

Edited October 16, 2014 by noobsrtoast
